title: Holland Fonts
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224553/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224553/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Holland Fonts**

Designer [Max Kisman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224553/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Max%20Kisman) founded Holland Fonts in 2002 to market his own typeface designs.

**URL:** [http://www.hollandfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224553/http:/www.hollandfonts.com/ "http://www.hollandfonts.com")

**Fonts:**

author: filip blazek
